text: Below are the Resources for the current Chapter of the story and cumulative resources for the previous chapters. When you are ready for your students to have access to the resources for the current chapter, make them available in the students' Resource Library tab as follows:

1. Drag the tiles below into your Log on the right, placing them at the top (above the previous chapter's resources).
  2. Note: you can multi-select tiles by holding down the shift key when clicking them
  3. Click the Publish button (blue rectangle with the up arrow, to the left of Log title)
  4. Go to the Resource Library tab (pink) and delete your previously published resources, leaving only the newest published material
Your students will now see the cumulative Resources under their Resource Library tab.
Evidence 1: The Effects of Stress on the Heart (video)
Questions About Evidence 1, The Effects of Stress on the Heart (video)
3. Both monkeys had the same diet and health care, the difference in their blood vessels is only due to the stress from social subordination.
